channel.title: How would I make it say when someone kills an npc?
channel.description:
Could anyone fetch or make me a quick example real fast and tell me were to put it?
Thanks.

item.title: How would I make it say when someone kills an npc?
item.dc:creator: @newservermaker newservermaker
item.description:
@newservermaker wrote:

[quote=“Newb 2341, post:6, topic:150170”]Use my tut here and add

server.playerHandler.messageToAll = playerName+" has killed NPC!";

to the part under your process boolean.
For example

if(X1 >= 1) { server.playerHandler.messageToAll = playerName+" has killed NPC!"; X1 = 0; }[/quote]

yet agein… to the rescue…

Read full topic
item.source: How would I make it say when someone kills an npc?

item.title: How would I make it say when someone kills an npc?
item.dc:creator: @Newb_2341 Newb 2341
item.description:
@Newb_2341 wrote:

Use my tut here and add

server.playerHandler.messageToAll = playerName+" has killed NPC!";

to the part under your process boolean.
For example

if(X1 >= 1) { server.playerHandler.messageToAll = playerName+" has killed NPC!"; X1 = 0; }

item.title: How would I make it say when someone kills an npc?
item.dc:creator: @Java_Is_My_Bitch Java Is My Bitch™
item.description:
@Java_Is_My_Bitch wrote:

Vladie:

. . . If I only had PkPoints. :\

Here:

client killerz = (client) server.playerHandler.players[KillerId]; if(killerz != null) { boolean givePoints = true; if(killerz.lastKill.equalsIgnoreCase(playerName)) { killerz.sendMessage("You recieve no pk points as you have pked "+playerName+" twice in a row"); disconnected = true; givePoints = false; } if(givePoints) { PlayerHandler.players[KillerId].pkpoints += lnew; PlayerHandler.players[KillerId].killcount += 1; otherpkps = PlayerHandler.players[KillerId].pkpoints; otherkillc = PlayerHandler.players[KillerId].killcount; killerz.sendMessage("You recieve "+lnew+" player-kill, you now have "+otherpkps+" player-kill points."); disconnected = true; killerz.sendMessage("You now have a total of "+otherkillc+" player kills."); int gp = (combat * 1200); // gives cash depending on combat level killerz.sendMessage("You recieve "+gp+" for killing "+playerName); killerz.addItem(995, gp); killerz.checkPKReward(); killerz.lastKill = playerName; server.playerHandler.messageToAll = killerz.playerName+" has killed "+playerName+", "+killerz.playerName+" now has "+killerz.pkpoints+" pk points and "+killerz.killcount+" kills!"; } } } deathcount = +1; } }

Your going to have to change ALOT of shit. Thats part of it the void though.

Read full topic
item.source: How would I make it say when someone kills an npc?
